alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, south central Columbus and east central Horry Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dulah, or 13 miles northwest of Little River, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shallotte, Bethel, Makatoka, Freeland, Nakina, Old Dock, Exum, Bughill, Longwood, Longs, Pireway, Ash, Dulah, Crusoe Island, and Goretown. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 13 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
